'''Professor Jarvis Oberblau''' is a professor at Cornell University. He was portrayed by [[John Balma]] in the [[season 9]] episode "[[The One In Barbados, Part 2]]".

He is seen twice: The first time when [[Ross Geller|Ross]] finishes his speech and then compliments him and the second time he talks with Ross and then his wife, Nancy comes back and when she's introduced, Ross says "Get out!"

==Trivia==
*It is implied that Jarvis is homosexual or bisexual because of his rather keen interest in Ross (holding his hand, offering him a getaway in his cabin), and his unenthusiastic response ("Oh, you're back...") when acknowledging his wife returning.
*He has a cabin in the Adirondacks.
